channel.title: Comments on: SASS mixin for responsive SVGs

item.title: By: roblevintennis
item.dc:creator: roblevintennis
item.description:
Interesting and similar to my http://unicorn-ui.com/blog/responsive-svg-mixin.html – my only concern here is that you're going to have duplication for svg { ... } even though you only need it once. I also feel that just setting the width to 100 percent and then scaling on the padding-bottom is most fluid choice.
Thanks for sharing your code mimoymima
